name: Lemon Poppy Seed Vegan Baked Oatmeal
description: For a Vegan Baked Oatmeal Recipe that tastes like a lemon and poppy seed muffin, look no further than this gluten-free and vegan Lemon Poppy Seed Oatmeal.

video.name: VEGAN LEMON & POPPY SEED BAKED OATMEAL | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
VEGAN LEMON & POPPY SEED BAKED OATMEAL

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/lemon-poppy-seed-vegan-baked-oatmeal-healthy/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

For a Healthy Baked Oatmeal Recipe that tastes like a lemon and poppy seed muffin, look no further than this gluten-free and vegan Lemon Poppy Seed Oatmeal. No added oil, and Nutfree 

This Healthy Vegan Baked Oatmeal is a comforting and cozy start to the day – and guess what? It tastes like a Lemon and Poppy Seed Muffin. The type of muffin that reminds us of road trips, picnics, bake sales, and all kinds of light-hearted springtime fun, or is that just me?

******MORE OATMEAL RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

recipeIngredient: 1 cup warm non-dairy milk such as almond, oat, (soy or light coconut)

recipeInstructions.text: In a 9x9, 7x11 or similar baking dish, add the oats, baking powder, salt, chia seeds, poppy seeds and coconut and mix well
recipeInstructions.name: In a 9x9, 7x11 or similar baking dish, add the oats, baking powder, salt, chia seeds, poppy seeds and coconut and mix well

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until well combined. Even the mixture out with a spatula. Let the mixture sit for 10 minutes for the oats to absorb some of the liquid
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until well combined. Even the mixture out with a spatula. Let the mixture sit for 10 minutes for the oats to absorb some of the liquid

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350F (180C) for 35 -40 minutes or until golden on the edges
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350F (180C) for 35 -40 minutes or until golden on the edges

recipeInstructions.text: Let it cool for 10 mins and then slice and serve with maple syrup or whipped coconut cream and fruits or berries.
recipeInstructions.name: Let it cool for 10 mins and then slice and serve with maple syrup or whipped coconut cream and fruits or berries.

keywords: baked oatmeal recipe, healthy baked oatmeal, vegan baked oatmeal
